meanings.definition: A small, three-masted Mediterranean sailing ship with lateen and square sails.
meanings.sent1: The xebec gracefully sailed across the calm sea.
meanings.sent2: The sailors admired the intricate design of the xebec.
meanings.sent3: The xebec decided to take a detour and explore a hidden cove.
meanings.sent4: The xebec cut through the waves like a knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the xebec against the sunset was truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A type of ship used by Barbary pirates.
meanings.sent1: The pirates loaded their loot onto the xebec.
meanings.sent2: The xebec swiftly approached the unsuspecting merchant ship.
meanings.sent3: The xebec crew celebrated their latest successful raid.
meanings.sent4: The xebec lurked in the shadows, ready to strike at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the fearsome xebec spread far and wide.
